test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black) (sort Y couch)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y refrigerator)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue) (sort Y table))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X green) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y desk))) )
test.nl: Do not pick up the red book. Do not pick up the red cup. There must be a black can on the couch. There must be a blue book in the refrigerator. Put the blue cup on table. Put the green cup in refrigerator. Open refrigerator. Put the white can in refrigerator. Put a book on desk.
